entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
